The maximum addiction stage of pesh paste never progresses beyond stage 1. Taking pesh paste suppresses the effects of addiction to all other forms of pesh. You gain a +2 item bonus to your next weekly save against addiction to pesh.

 **Saving Throw** DC 12 Fortitude; **Onset** 30 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 4 hours; **Stage 1** [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) and a +1 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks (1 hour); **Stage 2** [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) and 1 temporary hit point per level (first time you reach this stage only) (1 hour); **Stage 3** [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) and frightened 2 (30 minutes)
